about_the_game:
This game is a simple third-person 3D flight shooting arcade game.
Control the aircraft (MF-100) to destroy enemy ground weapons and aircraft, and complete the missions.
The game is a free add-on for the base game.

How to Play

You can select this game by pressing "Play" in the Steam app.

Features of this DLC Game

A 3D third-person flight shooting game.
Players control the aircraft (MF-100) from a third-person 3D perspective, destroying enemy ground weapons and aircraft.
Mission details are displayed on the menu screen and in conversation dialogs during missions.

Controls

ESC: Pause screen
Mouse: Control the aircraft
Move the mouse horizontally to rotate the aircraft
Move the mouse down to ascend the aircraft
Move the mouse up to descend the aircraft
A, D: Move the aircraft left or right (important)
W: Speed up
Right-click: Change weapons
Left-click: Fire weapons
Pressing the ESC key on the menu screen will display the options.

The new tracks added for this DLC have been included as mp3 files in the DLC folder within the game owner's local folder.
